Review Text: The staff at this hotel are second to none! Every single one of them is so friendly polite and extremely helpful from the reception to house cleaning restaurant and bar people. It has been and still is the most enjoyable experience anyone could want on there stay here! The rooms are very nice and clean with everything you could possibly want. I‚Äôm already looking forward to my next stay with them! Thanks team the little bit extra you guys put in has made it so worth while for me being here.with the kindest regards Chris

We recently stayed at truntum for 2 weeks as a family of 4 in a grand deluxe pool side room. We have always stayed here when it was grand inna as the location is amazing for us. The staff are all amazing and our toddlers loved spending time with all the girls at reception and at breakfast. My eldest loved joining in on the hotel activities. Thank you to Indayani & Nina for being so lovely to our family. We chose a pool side room so we could swim while the kids had a midday nap. One day our room hadn‚Äôt been cleaned before their sleep yet and we always put the do not disturb sign up and have the door locked. My husband rushed back in the room (because he heard something on the monitor) to find two men in the room who had woken up our girls and scared them. He told them to get out multiple times and when I went to complain about this I was told that it‚Äôs hotel policy to check the rooms at 2pm (they had used the master key) and that I need to call management to let them know that my children were sleeping. Absolutely unacceptable. It made me feel unsafe in my own room. If we hadn‚Äôt of experienced this I would‚Äôve given an absolutely glowing review but this policy needs to be reviewed. It‚Äôs a violation of privacy. Out of our two week stay we only had one negative but it was a pretty big one. We will most likely stay here again in the future but I will definitely be bringing this up and discussing it before checking in.

If you want a vacation without ever leaving the room, then choose this one! We stayed October 13 and 14 2025 at this gorgeous Hotel. It is dream location overlooking the Indian Ocean. We requested a room overlooking the beach/ocean and they upgraded for a small fee. We watched beautiful sunsets right from our room! The breakfast/dining area is set up right so close to the beach that you feel you can reach out touch the water! Large spacious/clean rooms, excellent service by the staff. Very polite personnel, they seem surprised when we tipped them, no expectations! Very attentive. We called them multiple times with various requests, each time they complied patiently and politely with a smile! Plenty of shopping walking distance to the hotel. We regret not being able to stay longer. Hope to go back. Thanks for making our stay so memorable.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê Saya sangat puas menginap di Hotel Truntum! Dari receptionist sampai bell boy, semua stafnya ramah banget, komunikatif, dan perhatian sama tamu. Excellent location right by Kuta Beach with warm hospitality Truntum Hotel enjoys a prime location just steps from Kuta Beach, ideal for beach lovers and sunset views. The rooms are clean and comfortable, though the TV reception and channel selection could be improved. The hotel is currently undergoing renovations, which may affect some facilities, but the staff are consistently friendly and helpful. Hopefully, once renovations are complete, all facilities will be upgraded and more hi-tech oriented, enhancing the overall guest experience

Myself and husband stayed here for 7 nights., 29July -6August 2025. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay, everything was great from the kind reception we received when checking in, as well as the lobby assistants, the staff was exceptionally helpful and friendly. We had spa treatments which was fantastic, a special thank you to Suci at the spa bookings, The breakfast was really enjoyable. Rooms were clean and spacious. Entertainment at the hotel was great, we enjoyed the Friday evening Sunset Grill . The hotel is easily accessible to the beach and shopping malls. Thank you Truntum staff for making our stay pleasant, we will surely be staying at this hotel on our next visit. We are happy to recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Bali.

One of legendary hotels in Bali under Inna Hotel chain. The architecture of the building has a vintage style of Bali in the old days. If you look for a nostalgic ambience of Bali, Truntum Kuta is a perfect place for you. Also the well known Kuta beach is just a walk distance from Truntum. Very strategic!

The staff are incredibly friendly, kind, and very attentive. They take great care to keep everything very clean and often decorate with flowers. I felt very comfortable and well taken care of as a lone traveler and I hope they are properly valued and well-paid by management.

Salah satu hotel yang cukup lama di bali. Harga kamar sepadan dengan fasilitas yang didapatkan. Bersih, nyaman, service juga sangat baik dari staff yang bertugas, namun ada beberapa fasilitas yang memang harus diperbarui. Ada akses langsung menuju pantai, jadi salah satu pertimbangan kenapa memilih hotel ini selain dari harga dan fasilitasnya. Overall puas menginap di sini.

sewa kamar executive suite harga 2.6jt tp tidak sesuai ekspektasi. kamar emang cukup besar, balkoni besar view laut tp: - AC bocor sampe banjir ke lantai - Panggil perbaikan AC harus ditelepon 2x baru nongol teknisinya - Kamar jauh dari lobi hrs jalan 5-10 menit ribet, intinya hotel terlalu besar dgn akses membingungkan - bangunan kelihatan tua dan butuh pembaruan - breakfast kurang enak - akses ke kolam renang jg membingungkan - lainnya biasa aja jadi gak cocok dihargai 2.6 jt, pantasnya 1.6 jt aja dengan kondisi spt itu. klo punya 2.6jt mending booking Pullman yg standar atau hotel bintang 5 lain drpd executive tp kek gini.

Hotel bintang 4 bagian dari HIG Group. Sudah berkali-kali menginap di kamar dengan pool access. Keunggulan hotel ini terletak pada lokasinya yg strategis dengan akses langsung ke pantai. Interior kamar sudah diperbaharui dan spacious. Overall hotel ini oke. Hal yang mungkin dapat ditingkatkan adalah kualitas makanan waktu breakfast, baik variasi makanan maupun banyaknya pilihan serta rasa. Di waktu malam, di hotel terdapat Pasar Senggol, makanan a la carte dengan rasa yg masih ok dan harga reasonable. Di hari Senin dan Rabu tersedia buffet disertai penampilan. Hari Rabu terdapat pertunjukan barong yg masih cukup menghibur. PS. Hotel ini sangat pas untuk menikmati Sunset di Kuta Bali.

House keeping gimana cara kerjanya? Masih jam 10 pagi ketika kita keluar kamar, mereka sedang membersihkan kamar sebelah, ketika kita kembali 1,5 jam kemudian kamar masih belum di bersihkan dan mereka sudah pergi. Kita complain ke front office bukanya minta maaf secara professional malah membela house keeping dengan berbagai alasan, bilang masih istirahat lah., gimana jam 11:30 siang waktunya kerja Bukan sih? We left at 10 AM?? Waktunya istirahat??? Mereka gak lihat sign ‚ÄúCLEAN THE ROOM‚Äù di gantung di pintu??? Bad management
Pelayanan ramah banget. Meeting room bersih. Audio bagus. Snack enak. Kamar bersih dan luas. Pantai sangat dekat, tp ga bisa bebas pemandangan krn banyak kios. Breakfast enak, antri, ramai.
lokasi sangat strategis, pelayanan cepat, kamar cukup bersih meskipun agak kuno. Mungkin area lobby dan kamar perlu direnovasi agar lebih modern. Overall memuaskan menginap di sini

Lokasi. : So far Lokasi bagus posisi sudut kuta, dekat pantai, kemana mana dekat Kamar : Bangunan lama namun terawat dengan baik Layanan : standard saja Resto : breakfast menu itu itu saja tidak variatif, tapi lumayan banyak pilihan kolam renang : biasa saja Suasana : di kamar dan di hotel membosankan.... Biar bintang yg bicara, bangun tidur, shalat shubuh, langsung jogging dipinggir pantai kuta, hotelnya persis di pinggir pantai kuta, ke discovery mall jalan kaki 500m dan ke beachwalk kurang lebih sama 500m, sarapannya lumayan 7 / 10, ada beberapa pelayan yg mendului turis asing daripada kami turis lokal üòÅ, wajar lah mungkin sdh budaya kalau turis asing lebih dihargai dari turis lokal, tapi ngga semua pelayannya, terutama kejadian ini di saat sarapan pagi, antri omelet duluan tapi turis asing dikasih duluan, kami dilewati üòÅüòÅ, semoga management bisa memperbaiki hal¬≤ spt ini, rekomen nginep disini, nyaman, tenang dan mau balik lagi kesini.
Akses pantai sangat dekat, pelayanan sangat baik, breakfast enak. Anak¬≤ sangat senang di sini. Sangat dekat dengan konservasi penyu, sehingga kami sempat mengikuti acara tukik release.

My 2nd time at Truntum Kuta. Convenient location to be able to go for a walk down the street. The staff are wonderful. Duty Manager, Charles or Charlie Boy as I called him, couldn't do enough for me. Solo, single, senior travelling alone went above and beyond to ensure that I was looked after very well. Thankyou ALL for your wonderful service. ‚ù§Ô∏è Paula

We stayed 10 days in May and it was great the staff were amazing friendly and helpful . Special mention the manager koca kola making sure we were happy and share some useful tips also Astika was great very caring always ready to help . The hotel is just across the beach and very central for shopping. We loved it and will be back . Thank you for a great stay Santo and coco Di Dio

Love the Location. At Kuta beach Doorstep. All the Vibe. and Buzz. 100s of Restaurants just around. We gathered here for Business and Holiday. 4 nights 3 individual rooms. Buffet Breakfast was beyond Par. Staff were superb. Here's Juni and Annissa from the Front Desk. Made us feel welcome always. Picture taken on Day 3 of 4. So you will feel the warmth of this place...

I stay here because reviews. And you know what I see.i come bali many time. this hotel make me feel so bad I want to ask u why u give me yucky room ??.I don't know what to say Pic can say it.!! Never back again!

-Superb location . Just in front of the famous Kuta Beach -Three swimming pools in hotel compound so you can chill whole day in the hotel -3 mins walking distance to convenient stores/ restaurants/Shops and SPA‚ù£Ô∏è -Safe for ladies travellers as everything is closed with hotel

First let me say thankyou to Truntum Kuta Team, espescially Ms Widi who made our last day in bali so memorable, our room was upgraded and had a view directly to Kuta Beach. Even our room had complimentary decoration + welcome card and cake for our Honeymoon The hotel was great, the view from room are good (because the view it's partially covered) The location was great because it's beside kuta beach and hotel had a private access to the beach, The staff was also friendly and the breakfast was great But i wan't to give a little suggestions 1. The room need to upgrade (smart TV) 2. Maybe adding more protein station on breakfast would be better. Loved staying at Truntum , close to shops and beach , swim up bar, very family friendly. Would highly recommend.

Wira and Sri were the most incredible, kind and accommodating staff. In general a great place for lunch or dinner, great food and service. Highly recommended:)

For the past 7 years my wife and I have been staying at Truntum Kuta every trip we make to Bali. Even though we may stay at other hotels for the experience Truntum is a must as part of our holiday accomadation. We regard Truntum as our second home. From the Managers Putera, Cok, Ajik Juli, Mustana and Sudiana, to the Reception Staff, Dwi, Ewik, Agus, Indayani, Erik, Arya, Aditya, Putri, Juniarta, Diah, Anissa and Purnama, to The Guest Relation Officers Yani and Laksmi to my singing partner Aryawan, to the housekeeping staff , everyone at Truntum has always made us always feel so welcome. We now consider them all our family and will definitely continue to stay there. The rooms are always so clean and our linen always fresh. We have recommended Truntum to many of our family and friends, who now feel the same way, and love it to. The location is perfect, with every amenity you can think of a stone throw away. And last not least the perfect location to capture the beautiful Bali Sunset from the beach a few steps away. We forgot to mention our friend Kawitana, who hosts the Friday night Sunset sessions. He is always so bubbly and happy and has the best jokes. Connected with him at the Pool Bar and have from that day had a good friendship with him.
Pegawai ramah dan selalu siap membantu, hotel luas nyaman dekat kepantai, kebandara dan pusat perbelanjaan

Satpam disini anti kritik!! Saya menginap 4 malam disini, di 2 hari pertama saya parkir melalui jalur lobi, dan di hari ke 3 saya di stop di jalur lobi, dan di suruh mundur lagi. Fantastic place to visit. We have visited between June 19-22. Its a place to be right in the centre of famous Kuta beach and right on the beach with access from the hotel restaurant itself to the beach. Amazing market and famous mall just a stone throw away.

Have stayed in Bali many times. Hands down nicest hotel I have stayed at. Staff are super friendly and helpful. Made my partners birthday very special. They did a complimentary birthday cake and song at the buffet breakfast and later when we returned to the room there was a birthday card, flowers, snack box of sweets and they made a birthday cake out of towels, ribbon and flowers, was beautiful. Will definitely stay again. Beautiful location too.

We have been coming here for many years. Unfortunately the rooms, the outside facade of the buildings surrounding the Kelapa pool needs some attention. It is very tired. Please, please make some improvements. We have been coming here for many, many years but are considering a change on our next trip to Bali. We love the staff, the location, the breakfast and the pool rooms. Sue

You can tell this hotel used to be grand and nice back in the day, however now it's tired and needs more upkeep and maintenance (especially the bathrooms). The hotel is huge with 3 pools, but it also makes it feel very touristy, busy and chaotic (at breakfast it's hard to find a table). It's my least favourite of the 4 hotels I've stayed at around Bali, the other hotels were more unique, with a higher standard of service and nicer rooms. They also felt much more relaxing and peaceful places to stay. They give you a voucher for a welcome drink, but there is only 1 option - orange juice, no other alternatives are offered. The room was fairly big and spacious and would have been lovely when new. The bathroom on the other hand is small, with mould around the bath, toilet, sink. The mirror and taps are old and rusty. The shower pole fixture initially didn't work, but they fixed it for me. I found a bug in the bath mat (see photo). The worst was the mushroom I found growing out of the bath taps! (See photo) I've never seen mushrooms growing in bathrooms before! I also found a couple of ants in the little container with teas and sugar. The air conditioning unit needs a good clean, I got a sore throat from it, so tried to keep it off as much as possible. Towels are old and frayed, some with holes and stains. On my first night I went to their HQ restaurant and wanted to charge the meal to my room, which they said I have to speak to reception first and leave a deposit, no one told me this when I checked in. Thus the communication and information at check in could be better. Room service was a disaster. I ordered a Thai curry with rice and a drink. They forgot the rice and got my drink wrong. It took almost half an hour to get everything I ordered, by which time the food was cold. They then said I cannot charge it to the room, which was specifically why I left a deposit at reception the day before. I had to call reception who then sorted it. The hotel has direct access to the beach, but it's not nice like it looks in the photos. The beach is full of wooden logs and rubbish (see photo) and there were signs saying no swimming. They gave me a quiet room, but the walls and door are not soundproof at all. All night you can hear people banging doors, singing, whistling, using the safe, flushing the toilet etc.

Stayed over with my wife about 5 years ago and again this time, the hotel changed almost completely. It has become more modernized and bigger, obviously to attend the increasing number of clients. However we got a bit sad with the changes, as it seems like most of it were done to make their costs lower, rather than keep the same quality. The quality of the rooms and the ambiance was much more relaxing in the past, and the price was more affordable as well. Staff was super friendly and helpful, same with the service. I would still recommend if you plan on staying around this area, but don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs the same vibe as it was a few years back.

I love this Hotel but today they ruined many peoples day at the Beach with extremely loud music üòÆ people want to enjoy the Beach not Music so loud that you could not even talk absolutely ridiculous behavior I recorded a video to show how loud but I can't attach it here üòî

If you are used to a five star room just upgrade to the junior suite or above. Outside of that, this property is amazing. The location is the best, everything the hotel offers allows for seamless living. Now the staff.... I would easily give a 10 if i could. They are so nice, so considerate and always ready to accommodate your needs. I come from the US and planned a full 50th birthday party with them through WhatsApp. They were always available, always willing to bend over backwards to assist with my needs. My T.K family, I miss you already. Until next time, see you soon. Kimberly

Hotel Truntum Kuta, yang sebelumnya dikenal sebagai Grand Inna Kuta Bali, adalah permata tersembunyi di jantung Kuta yang menawarkan pengalaman menginap yang tak terlupakan. Salah satu keunggulan utama hotel ini adalah lokasinya yang strategis dengan akses langsung ke pantai. Bagi para penggemar olahraga pagi, berlari di sepanjang pantai dengan angin sepoi-sepoi dan suara deburan ombak menjadi aktivitas yang menyegarkan dan memulai hari dengan energi positif. Pemandangan matahari terbenam di hotel ini sungguh luar biasa. Anda dapat menikmati keindahan sunset langsung dari area pantai hotel atau bahkan dari balkon kamar. Langit yang berubah warna menjadi oranye keemasan menciptakan suasana romantis dan menenangkan, sempurna untuk mengakhiri hari Anda di Bali. Pelayanan di Hotel Truntum Kuta patut mendapatkan pujian. Stafnya ramah, profesional, dan selalu siap membantu dengan senyuman. Mereka memberikan perhatian khusus pada detail dan kebutuhan tamu, memastikan setiap orang merasa dihargai dan nyaman selama menginap. Fasilitas ruang konferensi di hotel ini juga layak diacungi jempol. Dengan desain klasik khas Bali, ruang konferensi ini memadukan elemen tradisional dan modern, menciptakan suasana yang elegan dan inspiratif untuk berbagai acara bisnis atau pribadi. Teknologi terkini dan pelayanan yang efisien menjadikan setiap acara berjalan lancar. Kamar-kamar di Hotel Truntum Kuta dirancang untuk kenyamanan maksimal. Interior yang modern namun hangat, tempat tidur yang nyaman, dan fasilitas lengkap membuat Anda merasa seperti di rumah sendiri. Kebersihan dan perhatian terhadap detail menambah nilai lebih pada pengalaman menginap Anda. Secara keseluruhan, Hotel Truntum Kuta menawarkan kombinasi sempurna antara lokasi yang menakjubkan, fasilitas berkualitas tinggi, dan pelayanan yang luar biasa. Bagi siapa pun yang mencari pengalaman menginap yang mengesankan di Bali dengan akses langsung ke pantai, pemandangan sunset yang memukau, dan sentuhan budaya lokal, hotel ini adalah pilihan yang tepat. Saya sangat merekomendasikan Hotel Truntum Kuta untuk perjalanan Anda berikutnya ke Pulau Dewata.

Hotel Truntum Kuta: Perpaduan Elegan antara Kenyamanan dan Keindahan Bali Terletak di jantung Kuta, Hotel Truntum Kuta menawarkan pengalaman menginap yang memadukan kenyamanan modern dengan keindahan budaya Bali. Hotel ini memiliki desain arsitektur yang unik, menghadirkan suasana tropis yang hangat dengan sentuhan mewah. Fasilitas Unggulan Kamar Nyaman dan Modern Setiap kamar dilengkapi dengan fasilitas lengkap seperti AC, Wi-Fi berkecepatan tinggi, TV layar datar, dan balkon pribadi yang menghadap langsung ke taman tropis atau kolam renang. Kolam Renang Luas Kolam renang infinity yang dirancang indah menjadi tempat sempurna untuk bersantai sambil menikmati pemandangan matahari terbenam. Restoran dengan Cita Rasa Lokal dan Internasional Nikmati sajian kuliner Bali yang autentik hingga hidangan internasional di restoran hotel yang menghadap ke taman hijau. Lokasi Strategis Hotel Truntum Kuta berlokasi hanya beberapa langkah dari Pantai Kuta, pusat perbelanjaan, dan berbagai atraksi hiburan malam. Lokasinya yang strategis membuat Anda dapat menjelajahi Kuta dengan mudah, baik untuk berbelanja, berselancar, atau sekadar menikmati suasana Bali yang khas. Pelayanan Ramah Staf hotel yang profesional dan ramah selalu siap membantu Anda untuk memastikan pengalaman menginap yang tak terlupakan. Hotel Truntum Kuta menjadi pilihan ideal bagi wisatawan yang mencari tempat menginap dengan suasana nyaman, lokasi strategis, dan layanan terbaik. Jangan lupa tinggalkan ulasan setelah menikmati pengalaman Anda di sini agar orang lain juga merasakan pesonanya!

Staff very friendly and helpful, nothing was too much! Right next to beach, direct access to beach also! Great location for food, shopping, massages etc. breakfast was really good! Room service and food by pools reasonably priced and was pretty good! 3 lovely, clean pools! Money exchange onsite which was the same rates as the streets! Amazing spa! The resort is quite big so if can‚Äôt walk far request a room at the front of hotel! We were in a deluxe pool side room at the front of hotel, room was spacious, clean and modern. Bed was comfortable! Bathroom is a little smaller and at times the bathroom smelt like sewerage- not all the time but I‚Äôve experienced at every hotel I‚Äôve stayed at here, just at random times and not all the time! Rooms at the front are definitely more modern than at the back- other family members with us also booked deluxe pool side rooms, and ours was definitely better, more modern, dividers between balconies which wasn‚Äôt at the back rooms- no balconies there just a couple of chairs and table on a step thing but definitely not a balcony! Unfortunately when we all booked, the photos only showed the room I was in, and did not have the older rooms- this may have changed our room preference. Despite those minor issues, I‚Äôd stay again! Definitely family friendly and staff were amazing! If booking deluxe pool side, request rooms in the 3000‚Äôs not 2000‚Äôs
Mohon maaf sprei banyak bercak merah2nya Saat makan pagi pilihan tidak banyak Creamer pun tidak ada Minta creamer pun tidak ada sekelas hotel

Let's begin! The hotel is very well positioned, across the road is Kuta Beach. The check-in staff was very kind, we got an upgrade to the room. The breakfast was tasty. But... the hotel is under renovation, the room doesn't look like a 4-star hotel, the cleaning is about 75%. During the night there is quite a lot of noise from the traffic on the street (we had a room on the street). Overall, let's say it's worth staying here. But, there is a problem with what happens in the hotel area, even on the sidewalk in front, my opinion is that you are almost not safe at all, or you have to be careful on the left and right. There are very, very many suspicious people, who first ask you if you want to rent a scooter, then ask you what kind of drugs you want. Even on the smaller streets in the area, where there are many restaurants, you are not safe.

All staff were very friendly including greetings from every staff member as we walked around the property. There are 3 pools to choose from but seating is limited so get there early! We ordered lunch at the pool on several occasions and enjoyed everything. Our room had a balcony and at least twice the door was not locked by service staff. This was a major concern as there is easy access, via the balcony, from the room next door.
Loved my stay here, everyone was so pleasent and welcoming, the food and drinks were great and affordable, Aryawan was extremely amazing, would definitely recommend and will be coming back

Pasar Senggol hanyalah nama yang sebenarnya pasar rakyat dengan harga merakyat tetapi bukan di hotel ini karena harga makanan dan minuman bintang lima. Sebetulnya tanggung air seharga Rp 25k. Hati hati kasir yang tidak jujur tidak mengembalikan uang kembalian dengan benar dengan sengaja. Pegawai yang banyak dan tamu sedikit banyak menganggur dan kebanyakan berbicara dengan sesama kolega mengabaikan tamu yang butuh sesuatu. Harusnya semuanya focus kepada tamu bukannya kebanyakan celoteh¬≤ yang aneh bagi tamu. Ruang kasir yang gelap tidak bisa melihat uang dan kassa bon dengan jelas. Ober yang mengabaikan dan tidak memperhatikan request pesanan tamu dengan baik, tugas hanya mengantar makanan , itu saja. Makanan lumayan harganya tidak.

Great service, great location, great facilities! We had a wonderful 5 day stay here with all of our needs being cared for. A bunch of young females celebrating a birthday and we felt very welcomed. Santi (one of the workers) cared for us every day. Swim up bar was so fun and the restaurant was delicious! We got massages everyday and could walk straight onto the beach to go on our adventures. Truntum Kuta, formerly known as Grand Inna Kuta, is a remarkable hotel nestled in the heart of Kuta city, boasting a prime beachfront location. My stay at Grand Inna Kuta was a wonderful experience that exceeded my expectations. The hotel's prime location right on Kuta Beach offered stunning views and easy access to the beach, making it an ideal choice for beach lovers and those seeking to immerse themselves in the vibrant atmosphere of Bali. The check-in process was smooth and efficient, and the staff members were warm and welcoming throughout my stay. They were always ready to assist with any inquiries or requests, which added to the overall sense of comfort and hospitality. The hotel's facilities were impressive, offering a range of amenities to cater to various interests and needs. The pool area was spacious and well-maintained, providing a relaxing environment to unwind and soak up the sun. Additionally, the beachfront location allowed for effortless transitions between the pool and the beach. The rooms at Grand Inna Kuta were spacious, clean, and equipped with modern amenities. The comfortable beds ensured a restful night's sleep, and the sea view from the balcony was a delightful bonus. Housekeeping was prompt and efficient, maintaining the rooms in top-notch condition. One of the standout features of the hotel was the delicious and diverse breakfast buffet. It offered a wide selection of both local and international cuisines, catering to various palates. The dining experience was complemented by the beautiful views of the ocean, creating a perfect start to each day. Being in the heart of Kuta, the hotel was surrounded by numerous dining, shopping, and entertainment options, making it a convenient base for exploring the area. Whether it was strolling along the beach or exploring nearby attractions, Grand Inna Kuta's location made it easy to experience the best of what Bali has to offer. However, the hotel's central location means that it can get quite busy and noisy at times, especially during peak tourist seasons. This might not be ideal for those seeking a tranquil and secluded retreat. In conclusion, Grand Inna Kuta is a fantastic choice for travelers looking to experience the vibrant and dynamic atmosphere of Kuta Beach. With its prime beachfront location, attentive staff, and excellent facilities, the hotel offers a delightful stay for both leisure and business travelers. While it might not be the most serene option due to its central location, the convenience and the overall experience make it a top-notch choice for a memorable stay in Bali.

Hotelnya bagus, kamar oke.. hanya saja menu makanannya krg oke. 2 kali sarapan, menu yg paling enak menurut ku bubur Bali. Trs urap2nya. Mienya keras, trs untuk dessert paling suka panacottanya. Great location, affordable, friendly staff. The hotel is central and surrounded by great restaurants, and the beach is very close. I highly recommend this hotel for your next stay.

I came and stay during long weekend. My flight was early and came to hotel around 11am. Juni assisted me and said he will contact me once the room is ready before 3pm. He was very friendly and informative. Got the room facing the Kelapa Pool and room was clean and comfy. During my stay, housekeeping took care the room and I always comeback to the clean fresh room! All the staff are very friendly and always smiling. Thank you!

This was a well-known hotel since in the 80s. However, some parts of the hotel were just being renovated. The property is big, they have 3 swimming pools. The location is just the opposite of Hard Rock Cafe, by Pantai Kuta. Beach Walk mall and Discovery are just walking distance. The room is modern and clean. All the staff were very friendly and helpful. However, the breakfast is just so-so. There were many staffs to serve and help during the service. The coffee and tea were too dark/bitter when I came around 8-9 oclock. The menu selection is outdated and limited. But I like the fact that we can have breakfast by the beach

It is located rather near the airport. The room is spacious and the bed is very comfortable. Housekeeping is excellent too. The service there is excellent and the people are polite. They also have security to ensure safety. However, having meals there is quite expensive. Prepare to spend around $10-$20 for each meal. A beer cost $4 and a breakfast buffet cost $15. Pick-up to the airport is expensive. $20 to drive you 3km to the airport.

Pengalaman menginap 4 hari 3 malam disini,kamar setiap hari dibersihkan,tersedia amenities mandi,kulkas,brankas,hairdryer,teko pemanas,kopi,gula,teh,krimer,2 air minum,sendal. I'm currently staying here. Nice spacious pool access room. I love this place,it is a bit more expensive than some other hotels,but it is more of a resort. Thank you to all the staff here for keeping this place perfect.

3 malam yg sangat berkesan bersama suami tercinta . Staff nya sangat ramah & helpfull. Sangat suka dengan hidangan sarapan yg banyak pilihan , sangat indah dinner dengan view pool yg tenang & musik yg lembut . Sangat puas & menjadi hotel favorit kami . Worst 4star hotel that i ever stay... Pelayanannya jelek dr awal booking kamar, ada request kamar berdekatan eh malah sampe beda lantai beda building. The place is very rundown but excellent location. Great breakfast over looking the beach. We had a ocean view room and while lovely to watch the sunset with the floor to roof windows, once the afternoon sun hit it was unbearably hot and the little air con was powerless against it. Smart TVs would be a huge improvement as there is nothing to watch on the 3 english channels. The staff are sensational!!!

We are a family of 4 whose booking didn‚Äôt come through properly. When we approached the Manager Yani, she was extremely helpful and understanding and immediately accommodated us in an executive suite with extra beds. She followed up on us till we settled in the room. The entire staff was extremely helpful. The place itself is right at Kuta beach, the breakfast view is worth it. Breakfast buffet Food was delicious with lots of options. Strongly recommended place if you visit Bali.

Saya kasi judul :Sempurna Kenapa sempurna, karena untuk ukuran hotel tua, konsistensi dan perawatannya tergolong bagus. Hotel Inna, atau Grand Inna di Bali ada 3. 1 di Denpasar, 1di Sanur (yg paling tua dan paling besar) dan yg 1nya lagi di Kuta, tempat saya menginap sekalian mereview. Lokasi : Strategis karena persis di tikungan jalan ke pantai Kuta. Semua orang pasti selalu nengok hotel ini, karena cuma di kanan jalan dengan logo dan namanya yang eye catchy. Room : Bagus, luas, bersih, nyaman, tidak berbau, AC dingin kencang dan view ke pantai. Resto/breakfast : Banyak menu pilihan dan enak, tapi tidak enak banget loh yaaa. Pelayanan cepat dan ramah. Harga : Relatif terjangkau untuk hotel berbintang sekitaran situ. Akses : Pantai Kuta tinggal nyeberang dari resto, KFC, Yoshinoya, Flapjack, Circle K, Indomaret, Jamie Oliver resto, HardRock, pusat suvenir, Beacwalk, seafood resto semua dekat. Transportasi : Dari dan ke airport cuma 15 menit +- kalau tidak macet. Parkir : Luas banget di dalam untuk mobil dan motor. Akses disabilitas : Ada jalur untuk kursi roda Ok segitu aja dulu, semoga yang baca review saya kapan2 bisa main kesini. Selanjutnya bisa cek di youtube : @freandydavid

They upgraded our room into a pool view, which is so nice. Service was great. The room is very spacious & has a warming interior, but the bathroom is quite small. The hotel area slightly resembles a maze to me. If you have a so-so or bad sense of direction, better draw a map. Breakfast area is by the pool next to the beach, the food selection was standard, it's just not so pleasant when it gets too crowded. Wifi sucks.

One of the best hotels I have stayed in Bali. Hotel is in very good condition. Its very big, 3 nice pools and room was clean, modern, and comfortable. Bathroom was great and nice hot shower with good water pressure. Very good value too and the buffet breakfast was excellent with a large selection and very fresh. The best part of my stay were the staff. Every staff member I came accross said hello and had a big smile. The staff moral is very good and they went above and beyond numerous times and I only stayed 1 night. Special mention to Muklis who showed us to our room and also looked after our luggage after we checked out. Muklis helped us to the pool showers so we could have a shower before our flight and carried our bags everywhere. He is an absolute credit to your hotel. Also Mustana, who we only breifly dealt with was so amazing and put us in a taxi and was super friendly. I highly recommend Truntum Kuta, its my best experience in Bali on over a dozen trips in 20 years. Thank you, Darin Ed

The staff are super lovely and so welcoming, everyone always greeted us and asked us if we needed anything or how we were. The rooms are lovely could do with some refurbishing as well as the facilities around the hotel. The hotel it‚Äôs self was always clean and the staff tidied our room daily always supplying us with fresh linen. Had a wonderful experience.

Lokasinya mudah ditemukan. Parkirannya cukup luas. Harga sesuai dengan fasilitas. Ada 2 swimming pool yang tersedia. Panoramanya menghadap kelaut, seperti umumnya hotel hotel di Bali. Namun karena memiliki 3 gedung dengan penamaan kamar yang agak tidak umum, jadi ketika diwaktu awal menginap pasti bingung ketika mencari resto dan jalur lainnya.

We just needed a place to stay in Kuta as a little bit of a stopover between destinations and to get some clothes tailored. Location is pretty central in Kuta and right near the beach. Given the price of this place we were a little disappointed. Staff are friendly enough and say hello, however rooms and facilities are looking a little tired. The breakfast is a little like the place, bland, busy and generally unfulfilling. What was most disappointing was we asked lady at reception to book us a taxi to the airport, to which she replied yes and wrote down - however when we arrived at the time were advised ‚Äúno taxis‚Äù, we have drivers to take you for 200k. Menginap di sini setelah sempat pindah2 dari daerah Ubud dan Uluwatu. Ini juga pertama kali lagi menginap di daerah Kuta setelah lebih sering menginap di daerah Seminyak. Lokasi adalah keunggulan utama dari Grand Inna Kuta, jika ingin memilih hotel yang berlokasi persis di tepi pantai dengan harga terjangkau, hotel ini sangat direkomendasikan...üëç Tapi beberapa hal yang cukup mengecewakan adalah AC di kamar kurang dingin, ada spot bocor persis di atas shower kamar mandi, toliet di restoran sarapan juga kotor dan banyak fasilitas hotel yang rusak, mungkin karena memang karena umur hotel yang sudah cukup tua. Pilihan menu dan rasa sarapan juga standar. Walaupun begitu sesuai informasi Saya di atas, Saya tetap merekomendasikan hotel ini jika memang mencari hotel di daerah Kuta yang terletak persis di pinggir pantai dengan harga terjangkau. Keunggulan lain adalah banyak mini market di sekitarnya, jadi mudah membeli air mineral jika kurang, karena di hotel maksimal hanya disediakan 4 botol ukuran 600 ml per hari. Tips dari Saya adalah jika ingin pemandangan pantai dari sofa, silahkan memilih Junior Suite, tetapi yang jadi catatan adalah kamar ini tanpa balkon

Dua malam menginap di sini. Terkesan bgt sama rasa masakannya, menu sederhana tp rasanya enak2 semua apalagi menu2 khas bali nya, lezaat! Lokasi juga sangat strategis, ada akses lgsg ke pantai kuta, keren pokoknya

We had the pleasure of staying here last month. The room was very clean and spacious. The staff were wonderful , nothing was too much to ask for. I was given a birthday cake compliments of the hotel , delivered to our room. We were also given a lovely fruit platter. The ladies in the spa were absolutely beautiful (we spent quite a bit of time in there)The only thing we could fault was the toilets at the breakfast area. No fault of staff but very very high traffic area. All the other amenities were perfectly clean. Fantastic location. Cant wait to stay with you again.

Location amazing for obvious reasons. Room is just your average room in bali. Nothing bad to say about it. Soo good üëç Unfortunately the service we had the first day we got here. Most staff are friendly its just sad that one bad staff member puts the look on all of them. We also did not get compensated at all üòï
Kamar luas, lokasi pinggir pantai Kuta, menu sarapan lumayan, tempat sarapan nya enak bs dipinggir kolam renang sekaligus tepi pantai. Sayang kolam renang bukanya krg pagi

Stayed here for 10 days and it was a great experience, although the room was downgraded from the original booking (grand deluxe) to a smaller room (deluxe) due to some issues with the air conditioning. Great service and customer recognition. The breakfast is fantastic.

Friendly staff, great service. The hotel is very clean. 3 pools with bars. Buffet breakfast is amazing. Close to the beach and touristy areas. Cok was very helpful and gave us a lot of information and ideas. Highly recommend this hotel to stay in to whoever is traveling to Bali.

First of I would like to say all the staff here were absolutely wonderful. so very helpful and kind.and Secondly it‚Äôs such a great family friendly hotel. the swim up bar pool was fantastic and eating at the restaurant by the beach side pool was so lovely . But mostly I would like to give a massive shout out to Dion in reception he is a true gem and asset to the hotel he has been absolutely amazing When the personalised 40th birthday cake I had previously ordered from a shop outside of the hotel failed miserably he managed to save the day and source me a cake in like an hour . Such a kind person he went above and beyond for me. So if you ever stay here and need anything Dion is your man.

Rather disappointed in this stay this year - i found the room so noisy and could be very easy fixed - just put some felt pads under those chairs in the room and that would solve this issue - loud banging doors not for me will not stay here again - the staff are polite and its beachfront and the price is reasonable however the noise is a deal breaker for me.

I have stayed at Grand Inna Kuta for 5 night. During my stay, I celebrated the New year. The hotel is just beside beach and walking distance to the Kuta Center. The Hotel has two part old building and new building. All deluxe rooms are located at new building whereas all standard rooms located in the old building. The old building is three-floor building and not having the lift installed. I liked most the location of the hotel and the swimming pools. The hotel has three good swimming pool. Two are located inside the hotel and other next to the beach. As I traveled with my son, we took a room with king size bed. The bed was so big that we were very comfortable on it. The hotel serves complimentary breakfast. The breakfast was average but not bad. The room's floor was so moist and some of the electric points were not working. The air condition was not properly working in one of my room. The staffs were very good and attentive. Many shopping locations and food shop are very close to the hotel.

Hotelnya sebenarnya bisa dibilang hotel tua. Tapi bngunan Dan kamarnya Masih bagus. Dan hotel ini tetap akan rame karena lokasinya yang super strategis. Ini bakalan jadi referensi nginap kalo di Kuta , Bali Karena telat dipinggir jalan sampingnya ada Hard Rock Cafe. Trus akses langsung ke Pantai mana ada kolam renangnya yg ngadep pantai. Everything was perfect here.. stay for 4 nights, it was all great. - Breakfast changing everyday.. you won't get bored - location in front of Kuta beach and also near to beachwalk mall - hotel has 3 swimming pool, all are lovely, water is also warm - Rooms is big, and super cool AC! - Very lovely and supportive staff! 5 star! - express check in and check out - quality of food is great.. no disappointment. - internet super fast, I checked it over 100mb bandwidth download. The only minus in mind is keep open the pool and pool bar until 10 pm, hope it happen Thank you for everything, it was lovely 4 great nights, my kids also loved it so much, see you again soon.

Hotel yang strategis, karena memiliki akses langsung di Pantai Kuta. KEKURANGAN (yg bisa di perbaiki) - Tombol lift di lantai 3 tidak bisa ditekan untuk ke bawah, jadi kalo mau turun harus tekan atas - Makanan kurang Variasi, saya menginap 4 malam, tetapi makanannya cenderung sama - Kamar mandi tergenang

We as family of 3 stayed for 7 days and everyone really loved this hotel and location right next to beach. The room service has been quick and all staff has been courteous and polite. Little upgrade to room is required which can happen over period of time. Would really love to come back again.

Nice place to stay in Bali, nearest to the beach. You can enjoy your breakfast in front of sea and the hotel staff is welcoming. 2 nice pools inside the hotel where you can spend time with your family or loved one. Breakfast buffet is good having many options. If you want to have a good time and enjoy the nature, will recommend this. Rooms are spacious and have all necessities.

saya mengunjungi saudara yg menginap di hotel ini. lokasi bagus, tepat di pantai kuta, hotel mempunyai akses langsung ke pantai kuta. view restoran langsung ke pantai kuta. restoran sepi dan tersedia bnyk tmpt duduk. pemesanan di restoran lama sekali bahkan untuk air saja, memesan jus alpukat, setelah menunggu lama baru disampaikan kalau tdk tersedia. dekorasi restoran biasa. view hotel dari depan, view kamar terlihat mewah, luas dan bagus. ranjangnya besar sekali bisa muat 3org dewasa. kamar cukup luas. ada kolam renang. akses ke hotel juga mudah. pelayanan dan keramahan kurang. hotel ini cocok utk lansia dan anak krn akses ke pantai yg mudah.

Dapat kamar executive suite, kamarnya luas, bagus. Staffnya ramah2 dan membantu. Buat yang ingin menginap di samping pantai Kuta,, cocok memilih hotel ini. Pelayanan ramah. Saya memilih kamar junior suite. Kamarnya luas dan bersih. Anak-anak suka. Hotel legendaris di kawasan Kuta, sangat luas, dari belakang hotel bisa langsung ke pantai. Kamarnya luas, kolam renang besar ada beberapa buah. Kalau malam di depan hotel ada warung senggol, dimana kita bisa menikmati makanan khas indonesia....

Lokasinya di pantai Kuta. Hotelnya cukup besar dan jarak kamarnya sangat jauh dari lobby kalau kamarnya di tower 2. Cukup strategis karena lumayan dekat juga dengan beachwalk, jalan kaki sekitar 15 menit. Karyawannya sangat ramah dan membantu. Kalau sore bisa sunset an di Pantai Kuta tinggal keluar hotel ke kiri udah bisa menikmati sunset.

Letak strategis, benar2 didepan pantai kuta. Ada 3 kolam renang, yg paling besar namanya Kelapa pool,,saya paling suka karena rindang. Petugas hotel juga nawarin pijat kaki atau badan, juga bisa pasang kutex. Soal harga silahkan saling tawar aja. Kalau saya 100 rb 30 menit pijat kaki. We stayed for 3 days @Truntum, firstly we were very much pleased by the staffs gesture, they are always smiling, helpful.We got a sea view room, room was well maintained,housekeeping was good,felt very secured.Morning breakfast was descent,.SPA was very good,relaxing,well maintained. The hotel is just beside the sea.I would really be happy to opt TRUNTUM for the next BALI stay.

Great location and friendly staff. Found the buffet breakfast food to be cold on several occasions. Lunch ordered once in the HQ dining area where I saw a rat and they forgot my partners meal (only 2 of us and not busy). Room service food twice tasted like it had been left in and warmer for too long and was dried out. The WIFI continually dropped out. I had to report this multiple times a day! I could tell they were getting sick of me. Don‚Äôt stay here if you need to use WIFI. Our room had a broken rain shower that was never fixed and sink plug that maintenance had to lift up to drain the water every day. The air conditioner was quite dirty and didn‚Äôt provide enough cool air once the afternoon sun hit so we had to keep the blinds closed and block out our ocean view. Rooms really need maintenance. Would not expect this from a fairly expensive hotel. Probably won‚Äôt be back to this location, plenty of other places in Kuta beach area.

A good hotel in an excellent location, but there are some things that really need to be improved, 1. The room does not have an electrical outlet next to the bed, a significant disadvantage 2. A lot of walking from the entrance to the hotel to the rooms 3. The hotel is outdated and not well maintained, for example the glass in my room was broken, as well as the structure Looks very old and uninviting from the outside. To praise Juni's excellent service! A good guy who only wants to help, also to note that the hotel let me enter two hours before the time and an hour later to check out

Splendid location and a great property with a very lively crowd. Evenings around the property is the heart of Bali excitement. Beach walk and the parallel street is a delight. Superb hospitality I must say.

Awesome hotel, awesome location. Hotel has 3 pool! How cool is that?! I tell ya one of the pool in front of the restaurant is the real infinity pool. It has direct view to the beach, literally direct to the beach! Too bad we only stayed here for 3 nights, the room is clean, breakfast great, dinner was great and with affordable price. Definitely will come back and stay longer. ‚ù§

Tempatnya enak. Stafnya ramah. Pada saat datang diberi voucher utk ditukarkan dgn welcome drink di cafe hotel. Klo menurut sya, bangunannya sudh agak tua dan interior kamarnya menurut sya standar saja, tpi kelebihan disini adl posisi hotelnya yg tepat berhadapan dgn pantai kuta. Sya mencoba menginap di Deluxe Sea View (dpt harga 577k booking dri website hotel) dan Deluxe Room (extend lgsg di front desk dpt harga 500), isi kamar dan interior kedua tipe kamar tsb sama persis. Yg membedakan hanya view jendelanya saja. Tapi dgn harga segini utk sekelas hotel ini, worth the money bgt sih.

Stayed in 3128 type of room grand deluxe room with garden view. The bathroom has a faucet for wudhu. The bed is 200x120x2 (2 single beds attached) and very comfortable. 30 feet to the pool and 50 feet to the beach. Discovery Hotel is more luxurious, but the shower is leaking everywhere, the pillow is too thick and too hard, less comfortable compared to the one in Truntum. The beach at truntum is definitely better than Discovery. In truntum beach, you can rent Body Board for $3 per day, Beer Bintang for $2 per botol, Surfing board for $20 per day, Coconut for $2.50, full body massage on the beach for $10 an hour. You have to buy something to sit on the plastik chair provided by the street vendor to watch Sunset. In Discovery Beach, there is no street vendor. The sand is too soughy and is not kid friendly.

We have just returned after 7 nights at this hotel. The rooms are modern, gardens well tended and position is fabulous. Breakfast was very busy and seating was sometimes difficult to find. The pools were very disappointing. Each morning towels were placed on pool chairs by guests. Making it very difficult for guest to get a chair in a shady spot or even get a chair at all. The pool staff did nothing to police this. At one point a guest was verbally abused by another guest as she had sat on a pool chair that this awful woman thought was hers, because it had a towel and magazine on it. This very loud woman was never spoken to by any of the staff and every day after that, her 2 towels were placed on the same 2 pool chairs every morning and left there all day. During this altercation the staff watched on and did absolutely nothing. Another problem was unsupervised children in the pool. Parents sometimes nowhere in site. Slapping pool noodles on the pool water repeatedly, screaming and yelling and parents just ignoring their behaviour. Another problem was mothers feeding their children while in the pool. Sometimes leaving rice and vegetables floating in the water. Whatever happened to children getting out of the water to eat? I did email the GM at the hotel, but I did not receive a response. If you are looking for a stress free hotel, where you can lie by the pool on a pool chair and be able to have some peace, do not stay at this hotel!

Akan lebih asyik jika pihak hotel menyediakan sepeda angin untuk tamu, sehingga memudahkan tamu untuk lebih eksplore sekitar Kuta. Dan sayang sekali kondisi cenderung kurang terawat (mungkin karena pandemi), tempat parkir terbatas mengingat banyaknya jumlah kamar, colokan listrik hanya ada di meja tv , tidak ada di dekat tempat tidur. Untungnya pihak engineering hotel sigap dengan permintaan saya akan kabel sambung, sehingga tetap bisa menggunakan gadget meskipun sambil tiduran. Untuk sarapan, menu kurang bervariasi, bahkan di hari pertama buah sudah lembek. Semoga ke depan akan jadi hotel yang lebih nyaman.

Good location if you want to be in Kuta. Hotel is old but will maintained. Larger pool needs a regular clean, with the water getting murky by 11am. Wouldn't hurt to improve the breakfast, maybe a hashbrown or like as you usually end up with Bali belly at some point.

Kamarnya bersih, nyaman. Hotelnya pinggir pantai kuta jd pas makan pagi bisa sambil menikmati suasana pantai. Ada kolam renangnya juga.. Dekat dengan mall kalau misalnya mau ngemall üòÅ rekommended üëç

Second time staying here, we emailed and asked for connecting rooms on the ground floor and got exactly that. The rooms are clean and a good size, the buffet breakfast has a great variety and more than enough for everyone. All the staff are friendly and helpful. Pool with a swim up bar with a beach view. My family have been to Bali many times but l think Grand Inna will be the hotel for us in the future.
This is a nice hotel with three swimming pools. Breakfast changes most days but there is not a huge selection. But plenty to eat. Our room, 3125 is nice. Shower is fine. Bed is comfy.

Sudah dua kali menginap disini. Dulu ambil room yg sea view , dan terakhir kesini ambil yg garden view. Kalau disuruh pilih dan menilai saya lebih senang kamar yg sea view , hehehe. Oke, meski begitu sebenarnya saya senang dengan hotel ini dengan apapun tipe kamarnya, Karena: 1. Ruang kamar nyaman,bersih, kasurnya luas dan empuk, ada sofa panjang, untuk yg tipe garden view tersedia balkon. 2. Staf nya responsif ya, begitu saya datang di lobi langsung dibantu pindahin barang bawaan ke bellboy trolley. 3. Area parkir luas 4. Love how convenient it is to step from hotel to Kuta Beach! Room is larger than similar hotel around the area and housekeeping includes daily water top up. Breakfast menus are rotated every 4th days, so it was refreshing for a week stay.
Right at the Kuta beach! Lovely rooms, Super buffet Breakfast spread! Well designed pool bar, enjoy your drinks sitting at the bar, without exiting the pool! USP- Location!

Recomended untuk yang lagi dibali tepatnya di kuta. Lokasi hotel sangat strategis, kamar nyaman, para pelayanan ramah. Akses untuk jalan jalan didepan hotel sangat ramai dan mudah. Untuk akses ke kamar mungkin harus sering bertanya ke petugas karena lokasi hotel ada beberapa gedung/bangunan (Luas) üëçüëçüëç

I had a lovely stay at Grand Inna Kuta in a ground floor pool access room in the beach wing. It is quite a big sprawling hotel which is extremely confusing at the start but give yourself some time to explore and you‚Äôll be fine! The room was very clean and comfortable, made up in the time it took for us to go for a little walk each morning. I loved coming and going via the beach exit at the HQ restaurant, going right toward Beachwalk mall and left to loop around past many shops and Kuta Square. Having never stayed in Kuta before, I found the location to be fantastic. The other guests were a real mixed bag, to be expected at a large affordable resort but mostly quiet and inoffensive. All staff I encountered were extremely friendly, particularly Made on our first day who took us to our room and the various attendants at the Kelapa pool. I didn‚Äôt love being asked every few minutes by the pool if I wanted a massage / pedicure by spa staff etc as you get that enough walking down Kuta beach but no one was ever forceful or rude which I appreciated. I would definitely recommend this hotel for anyone considering it! Enjoy :)

Memilih hotel ini karena dekat dengan pantai, jadi nya bisa stay di hotel saja dan refreshing di pantai Kute, kolam renang nya juga ada 3, kita bebas mau berenang dimanapun. Untuk kamar bersih, fasilitasnya oke, untuk sarapan nya sih lebih dominan masakan western, mungkin tamunya kebanyakan bule nya... tp overall kami sekeluarga senang menginap di sini

First off the positives: the place itself is perfectly situated, food is great and service super nice and welcoming, within 5 min you're at the beach, next door is a surfing school, taxi service is present and the city life is a 5-10 min walk. So everything you could need is close by. There are 3 pools (1 was closed while we were there for reconstruction) and many extra services available including a pool bar. However, when we entered our room, we found a thick layer of dust on top of the bed structure and stains on the bed sheets. With everything else so perfect, it was a bit sad to see such easy things neglected. Overall we still really enjoyed our stay and had a great time.

Oke nginep disini, sebelah hotel langsung pantai kuta, jd pagi2 enak buat jogging antara jam 6-7 pagi, selebihnya udah mulai ramai. Makanan dekat dan banyak.. Buat anak2 aku suka karena kolam renangnya banyak, jd gak ramai walaupun kmrn infonya kamar juga banyak yg terisi. Breakfast untuk ukuran hotel bintang 4 pilihan gak banyak, rasa cukup enak. Kamar bersih, tapi karena hotel cukup besar, siap2 jalan jauh kalau dapat kamar di ujung. Tapi masih oke kok. So far recommended ya buat family vacation

Great location: direct access to the beach! This place has not one, not two, but three pools! The building may look old and dreary, but the renovated rooms are very comfortable. We stayed for five nights in a deluxe room with a balcony facing the sunken pool. The only reason I am giving four stars is because of the mould on the bathroom ceiling and the leaky sink (drips right at the end of the u-bend). Other than that, I wish the management would segregate the smokers from the non-smokers in the breakfast area.

The hotel is within walking distance from the renowned Kuta beach. Staff are friendly and helpful. Rooms are spacious and clean and if you are lucky enough, the view from your room would be great. Just right at the front gate there's a shower for those who just swam at the famous Kuta beach and want to clean themselves before entering the hotel.
Rooms are big and clean. Love sitting by the pool watching the waves crash on Kuta Beach. Breakfast is lovely. Staff are amazing and friendly and can't do enough for you. Will stay again.
Kamar lega. View resto menghadap laut. Lantai kamar kok lembab dan berembun. Makanan enak good taste. Tidak ada roti/cake gluten free.

Nice room and excellent service. Staff always very happy and say hello. Got a very nice view of the beach. Breakfast offers multiple options and is great. Only complaint is wifi not working. Just beware when exiting the hotel area as there are many hustlers

ANGELA AND MYSELF have stayec here at Truntum kuta on the beach three times in a row now its a fantastic spot, the staff are the best so helpful, nothing is a problem. masih suana lama, seperti hotel hotel pada umumnya, kamar banyak, ruang rapi, servis ok, dekat dengan pantai kuta, tinggal jalan kaki aja, parkir lumayan, namun jika banyak mobil mungkin area parkir tidak memadai. jika ada yang ingin sewa helicopter/helicopter tour di wa aja lihat profil saya terima kasih

Letak strategis,berhadapan dengan view pantai Kuta,pelayanannya oke+ramah Dan gercep,makanannya enak Dan cukup bervariasi,kamarnya juga bersih,cocok jadi pilihan buat staycation di Bali,thanks üíØ

I had a great experience in Grand Inna Kuta! The staffs are very friendly and hospitable. The welcome drink when we checked-in was really good! The room that I stayed was very comfortable and clean. Rooms are pretty standard. Location is prime compared to similar hotels along Kuta. It has direct access to Kuta beach via the back. Staff are friendly and helpfull, very nice to all guests, domestics and foreigners, which I really appreciate.

My husband booked the cheapest room on this hotel which is superior double room. The room was dated, old and need some renovations. It doesn't suit the luxury of the pool and location of this hotel. We got a room which has bad toilet smell. We asked to change the room, they were happy to accommodate that even though we had to wait for more than an hour in hour room to get the other room ready for us. Location is the best! We might come back just for the location and the service. We got a welcome plate with fruits and towel doves on the bed to celebrate our honeymoon. Staff are friendly. Overall we enjoy our stay.

My favorite hotel in Bali!!! Had a very nice stay. Just a short work to Kuta Beach. Lots and lots of shopping and dining area. The staff were great, clean, and reasonable price. Love having breakfast on the sea side. Will comeback for more.

We travelled from Australia and visited Bali for the first time. However, I got a different treatment from reception desk maybe because Im asian. My aussie partner got a very welcoming smile and coz i looked indonesian she just changed her treatment to me. Hopefully in the future the guests get treated equally.

My room is separated from my groups as they upgraded. small room without hallway and weird positioning for a grand deluxe room nothing grand but the size of the bathroom which not even bathtub in it. Spechless hotel bintang 4 dengan service yang kacau balau ... tidak termaintain sama sekali.. closet kotor dan kamar tidak di bersihkan secara details entah karena penuh atau kekurangan SDM ... malah ada kamar tidak di bersihkan sama sekali ... padahal sudah lapor untuk di bersihkan. Harga lumayan tinggi menang lokasi saja karena beach access nya saja.

1. All the floor staff (housekeepers, cleaners, bell boys, guards, pool and wait staff) are absolutely lovely, joyous and cheerful, plenty of warm greetings, and always very happy to help (Reception staff were pleasant and helpful but more reserved and distant - this is still fine) 2. You should note that photos even on google reviews do not reflect that the beach is now a busy market strip - right in front of the beach pool is an endless line of market stalls, a busy beach-long walkway with motorcycles and sellers. We avoided the beach pool despite having hoped for it to be a highlight of our trip, because it felt like swimming in a shopping centre. Sellers do not interact with you on hotel grounds but once you step past the boundary line they will flock to you for sales. 3. The pools were nice but somehow looked a lot better and larger in the pics. Still nice, and well maintained. 4. There were several gaps in the housekeeping quality when we arrived, however they were enthusiastically happy to rectify and assist as soon as asked, even in the middle of the night. The housekeeping staff were a joy to interact with on our daily morning greetings and their genuinely warm offers to help, I was very touched. 5. Location is unbeatable and I think superior to any other hotel in Kuta: At the beach exit (where the beach bar and pool is), is .the bustling beach market. Walk on along and you're at a nice clutch of local warungs (having several in one place is very hard to find in Kuta) in a pedestrian area and still facing the beach. How else can you dine beachside with 3K IDR dishes and comfy plastic chairs and tables, and with no touting sellers? .Walk on and you get to local tourist-goods stalls in a pedestrian strip, and then you reach the main road shopping area (start braving the touts), with western brands of goods, and eg. McDs and the japanese FamilyMart. At the main exit is several minimarts (first one is owned by the hotel) and ATMs, and a legitimate money changer. .Turn left and walk along the millionIDR hotel strip (or on the other side of the street to the beachfront market strip). This will bring you to lots of large party bars, and then the multimillionIDR Western-style shopping mall with tons of money clearly poured into decor and design. There's also a decent cinema with the latest movies for 4K IDR. .Turn right and you're at the main Kuta strip of endless stores lining a one-way single-lane road - all the tourist shopping and massage spas you could want, and good midrange restaurants. The small road means that while it's busy, the traffic is always crawling along slowly and therefore easy to cross the street (slowly, steadily, and making sure the driver sees you).

Bukan kaleng-kaleng, spechless. Kami nyampe disini skitar 2.15 WITA dan pelayanannya oke punya. Kamar agak jauh si dari lobby, but its okay, kamarnya mantep banget fasilitas lengkap, ada bath-up juga. View dr kamar bisa di cek di foto lengkap, bagus pol. Spent a quick two nights here at the end of our stay . We did not have a booking just walked in and they were so accommodating Big hotel with loads of options for everyone. So central to everything and right on the beachfront Breakfast had amazing options to suit everyone and never felt busy I always stay in Seminyak and always thought of Kuta as too busy It felt the same

There was mould and water damage everywhere. The pool had missing tiles. The sun beds were faded and we even found one with mould. The bathroom had a leaky tap and a was very water damaged. This is a gem. We stayed here over new years. Comfortable rooms. Excellent service. The breakfast is ok, all edible but needs more attention. The pool bar music is just a bit too loud driving the clients to other pools, which may be the idea. I will recommend this hotel.

The hotel need a bit more maintanence but in their favor Painters were already on the job in outdoor areas. The personel were very serviceminded and the rooms well cleaned. All services, such as drivers and activities were availeble for a reasonable price.

I stayed for two nights. They offered breakfast with a buffet concept and many kinds of food. You have access to go directly to Kuta beach from the first floor of this hotel. You can even eat your breakfast near the beach with the beach view that was so calming

Hotel yang berlokasi di bibir pantai, bisa langsung akses ke pantai. Fasilitasnya baik, bagi yang pertama ke sini, jangan samapi tersesat ketika menuju kamarnya sendiri. üòÅ sarapannya enak dan komplit. Ada 2 kolam renang. Kamarnya luas.

The hotel is just beside the main gate of Kuta beach making it a top class Location to stay. Importantly, it's about half an hour drive from the airport as well. If you want to stay in Kuta this hotel would be a good bet because of the proximity from Kuta beach' Legian street and Poppies road. All of these places are easily accessible by walk. There are lot of positives which I found it. Th check in was fast and smooth. The pool is excellent and you get 1 welcome drink every day at the pool. The rooms are spacious and the staff is quite friendly. I got a private balcony and it was quite nice sitting there and catching up on thoughts. All the rooms are non smoking thus you have to smoke in the balcony itself. The breakfast spread was pretty good and there are enough security personnel doing their duty diligently, however ensuring that guests who comes to meet you are not unnecessarily harassed in the name of security. The sight seeing options and the airport pick up and drop pricing was quite competitive which impressed me as well. I was actually quite impressed and would love to visit back again. A few of my suggestions to the hotel to work if possible. 1. The shower panel need to be checked. I mean the water jets out at the pace of knots which might hurt one if not careful. There should be an adjustment option to control the speed 2. A thorough check should be done before allocating rooms. The tea kettle in my room was dirty with sediments floating inside it. I had to call the room service to get it charged. While there was a delay in attending my request, however they provided me a brand new water kettle. 3. The tea bag provided was Jasmine tea. I mean we should have a better choice at least a breakfast tea would be really good. However, I would strongly recommend families staying I Bali to consider this hotel as its indeed very good and takes care of its guests.

The wife and I only stayed here for about 3 nights. Upon arrival, there was a rather large group checking in, but either they were set aside for us or they were checked in very quickly. Took about 15 minutes of waiting before we were tended to. Quite fast in my opinion. The bathroom that was available at check in didn't smell very pleasant. Like people didnt know how to aim whilst urinating. We were upgraded from garden view to pool view which was quite unexpected. The room was quite nice. There was some complimentary items. They gave more essentials even if we didn't ask for it when they cleaned the room. This is a plus in my opinion. I love not having to asl for more shampoo and the like. We were also provided with a nice little honeymoon note as well as a reasonably sizeable box of chocolate cookies that tasted quite nice. My complaint about this place is how many commoners there are here, and the lack of enforcement of mask and glove policy on the premesis. The commoners hardly wear masks, and when going to the breakfast buffet, they don't use the protective glove to retrieve their food. Considering we don't know who uses the rest room and doesn't wash their hands afterwards, this is kind of a disgusting though. The buffet attendants should be reprimanding the commoners and forcing them to wear the gloves. There's no shortage of rude smokers. Most of them sit upwind of everyone and then smokes like a choo choo train. Not pleasant. They should have a designated smoking area for these people that is located in a manner as to be downwind from other patrons at all times. The internet sucks. It's difficult to get a signal. Just like the FM7 in Jakarta, I am giving an automatic 3 stars for that. When you're a traveler, you expect reasonable access to Internet so you can conduct business or talk with family and friends in the homeland, and stay entertained as well. DO NOT... I REPEAT N. O. T. get your clothing washed here inless it is an absolute emergency. It's rediculously expensive. We needed to get our clothings washed, and decided upon a laundry washer somewhere around the corner. In total, I give 3 stars for bad internet, and refusal of the catering staff to enforce the mask and glove rule at the breakfast buffet. Overall, the staff that we encountered were quite nice. No complaints there. Suggestions to Grand Inna Kuta: 1) Install more wifi access points to allow a better connection to all the rooms. This isn't a tall task. They're easy to install. 2) Enforce the glove and mask rule. If a customer comes to the buffet, prevent them from touching the serving utensils until they glove up. Alternativelty, have the catering staff serve the food instead. This works just as well. 3) Designated smoking areas. Nobody likes a rude smoker... And there's more of them in Indonesia than respectful smokers.

Hidden charges on check out approx. $85 AUD was an annoying end to a very average stay. Typical Bali money grabbing scamming. When I asked to speak to the GM they brought me the Office Manager (Rodiyana) as the GM was in meeting. When I asked Rodiyana about these hidden fees and charges he replied with they are not hidden we just don't tell our guest unless they ask. He also admitted that many times they have this dispute with guest upon check out but they will just pay it. You have too were his exact words, how disgusting! But he did agreed that their Don't ask, don't tell policy on this matter is ethically wrong then finished off with But have to pay, called for security and walked away. I asked to speak to the GM again and they brought me the Room Division Manager Yemi who once again wasted more of our time and spinning a different story of how we are the 1st guest to ever question these hidden charges and that I couldn't talk to the GM as he is at the airport picking up guests and could be 2-3 hours. Yeah ok, the hotel General Manager (Ben) is at Denpasar airport waiting with all the other drivers, holding a sign, picking up guest. While the hotel transfer drivers are sitting here doing nothing. If you are looking to stay here I suggest you take a look at Bali Garden Beach Resort, its around the same price but a million times better in all aspects. Plus far better quality and prices on food, drinks and spa treatments. For the money you pay to stay here there is definitely much better in Bali and Kuta. Update: In response to your reply we did call down to reception & enquire on making a call to Australia as there was something urgent we needed to attend to. Not once were told it was $4 a minute & your Office Manager said that was because we did not specify ask How much does it cost? I guess we we're given a false sense of security with being told, in that same enquiry call, that an international call is bit more but not much more, No one once told us not much more meant $4 AUD a min. And this didn't seem to be information the receptionists or Office manager knew when we went to check out either. It took both the receptionist and office manager a good 5 mins to find out that figure so I guess that was all just to hard for someone to do when we made our initial enquiry call down to the front desk. But when it comes down to it, it's not about the money it's about the principal. Your front desk gave very misleading information & acted very dumb when we got down there. Your Office manager admitted it's a don't ask don't tell policy and he too agreed it was ethically wrong. So maybe that's your hotel policy to try a weasel an extra buck from your guests or maybe your front desk staff are undertrained & the female we spoke to that morning was too lazy to find out. Either way, even without that last issue at the end. Your decks are still rotting with big gaping holes, the rooms smell like mould & have loads of baby cockroaches inhabiting them, probably because the daily room clean are very poor, we were given wrong billing at not only twice at the pool bar but also at the restaurant (lucky we checked) and quite frankly the hotel is run down and you know it. That's probably why you're resorting to scamming your guest. Like I said for the amount you're charging a night, there is far far better quality and value for money in Bali and Kuta. We decided by day 2 of our 6 night stay that we would not stay there again. And maybe instead of trying to defend and minimise all your short comings as a 4 star hotel you should take a little something on board. Look at Bali Garden compared to Grand Inna, same pricing, same location, 2 very different levels of quality and service.

Fasilitas di hotel ini sudah tua dan pelayanannya buruk. Sofa di kamar saya berlubang bekas rokok dan tidak pernah diperbaiki. Saya pergi ke kolam renang di pagi hari, tetapi tidak bisa masuk karena mereka bilang tidak menyediakan handuk. Sarapan saya diambil meskipun saya hampir tidak menyentuhnya. Lensa kontak baru saya yang saya tinggalkan di kamar juga dibuang tanpa izin. Saya sudah membayar mahal untuk kamar suite, apa yang terjadi? Ini lebih buruk dari hotel bintang 1. Saya sudah membuang-buang uang saya. Ini hotel terburuk yang pernah saya tinggali.

Kami menginap di Truntum Kuta dan pengalaman kami sangat mengecewakan. Hotelnya jelas ketinggalan zaman, fasilitasnya tua, dan harganya sangat buruk. Dengan harga yang ditawarkan, kami mengharapkan layanan yang standar, padahal tidak demikian halnya di sini. Sarapannya biasa saja, kualitasnya rata-rata. Dan yang lebih parah lagi: jika Anda ingin latte, ada biaya tambahan, meskipun seharusnya sudah termasuk sarapan. Latte seharusnya standar, bukan biaya tambahan! Kamar-kamarnya sangat mengecewakan: bau lembap yang sangat menyengat, sampai-sampai menyebabkan masalah pernapasan. Kebersihannya juga sangat buruk. Sebelum perjalanan kami berakhir, kami menghubungi pihak hotel (tanpa mendapat tanggapan) untuk menanyakan apakah mereka bisa menyimpan dua ransel selama beberapa jam, karena kami akan kembali ke Kuta sebelum penerbangan malam kami. Tidak ada balasan. Setibanya di sana, kami mencoba bertanya di resepsionis, tetapi ditolak mentah-mentah karena kami tidak lagi memiliki reservasi aktif, meskipun kami telah menginap di sana beberapa hari sebelumnya. Tidak ada usaha sama sekali, tidak ada rasa pelayanan pelanggan. Kami bahkan berencana untuk makan di restoran hotel, tetapi setelah itu, sia-sia. Untungnya, hotel lain yang lebih ramah bersedia menyimpan tas kami, meskipun kami belum pernah menginap di sana. Kesimpulannya: kami pasti tidak akan kembali ke Truntum Kuta pada perjalanan kami berikutnya ke Bali. Ada banyak pilihan yang lebih baik di Kuta, dengan keramahan yang tulus.

Foto-foto tidak sepenuhnya sesuai dengan kenyataan. Terutama di sisi pantai, di mana Anda melihat ke arah jendela-jendela toko alih-alih laut. Mereka juga sedang dalam masa renovasi. Namun, pelayanannya sangat baik, dan lokasinya dekat dengan semua toko, dll. Anda tidak akan bosan!

Ini akomodasi terburuk yang pernah saya tinggali di Bali selama dua minggu. Saya akan menghabiskan malam terakhir saya dengan perasaan tidak nyaman. Pertama, jadwal penerbangan saya terganggu, jadi saya membayar di muka untuk dua malam, tetapi akhirnya hanya menginap satu malam. Saya meminta pengembalian dana, tetapi mereka menolak, jadi saya diberi voucher makan malam. Namun, voucher itu kurang dari sepersepuluh harga satu malam, dan bahkan ketika saya memesan makanan termahal, mereka menolaknya. Makan malam ini bahkan tidak sebanding dengan cumi goreng yang saya pesan di bar kolam renang malam itu. Ada restoran bagus lainnya di hotel, jadi saya tidak mengerti mengapa saya harus membayar sebanyak ini. Akomodasinya sendiri bagus dari segi lokasi dan ukuran, tetapi pelayanannya sungguh buruk. Mereka menolak memberi saya pengembalian dana, dan kemudian memperlakukan saya seperti saya membayar makanan kaki lima. Kenangan indah terakhir saya di Bali hancur oleh hotel ini. Jangan pernah membayar di muka. Uangnya memang sedikit, jadi saya tidak masalah, tapi sungguh menyebalkan membayangkan mereka bisa mencari nafkah dengan menyediakan layanan seperti itu. Ini merusak kesan saya tentang keramahan penduduk Bali. Semakin saya memikirkannya, semakin menyebalkan rasanya. Ada restoran lain juga.

Saat ini saya memesan kamar Grand Deluxe. Saya meminta kamar di lantai satu, tetapi mereka bilang kamar sudah penuh dan menempatkan saya di lantai tiga. Resepsionisnya sangat kasar dan kurang ramah. Kamar Grand Deluxe terletak di gedung lama. Hotel ini tidak memiliki lift... Saya harus berjalan kaki sampai ke lantai tiga. Kartu kunci saya rusak... Bellman yang membantu saya memindahkan barang bawaan membawakan kunci baru... tetapi kuncinya juga tidak berfungsi. Mereka bilang akan menggantinya dengan yang baru, tetapi saya menunggu 30 menit lagi... Saya bahkan tidak bisa menutup pintu... Nyamuk terus masuk ke kamar... Saya mengeluh sudah menunggu satu jam, dan baru setelah itu mereka memberikan kartu kunci baru. Saya protes, meminta pengembalian uang. Kamarnya dalam kondisi buruk. Ini bukan hotel bintang 4. You can tell this hotel used to be grand and nice back in the day, however now it's tired and needs more upkeep and maintenance (especially the bathrooms). The hotel is huge with 3 pools, but it also makes it feel very touristy, busy and chaotic (at breakfast it's hard to find a table). It's my least favourite of the 4 hotels I've stayed at around Bali, the other hotels were more unique, with a higher standard of service and nicer rooms. They also felt much more relaxing and peaceful places to stay. They give you a voucher for a welcome drink, but there is only 1 option - orange juice, no other alternatives are offered. The room was fairly big and spacious and would have been lovely when new. The bathroom on the other hand is small, with mould around the bath, toilet, sink. The mirror and taps are old and rusty. The shower pole fixture initially didn't work, but they fixed it for me. I found a bug in the bath mat (see photo). The worst was the mushroom I found growing out of the bath taps! (See photo) I've never seen mushrooms growing in bathrooms before! I also found a couple of ants in the little container with teas and sugar. The air conditioning unit needs a good clean, I got a sore throat from it, so tried to keep it off as much as possible. Towels are old and frayed, some with holes and stains. On my first night I went to their HQ restaurant and wanted to charge the meal to my room, which they said I have to speak to reception first and leave a deposit, no one told me this when I checked in. Thus the communication and information at check in could be better. Room service was a disaster. I ordered a Thai curry with rice and a drink. They forgot the rice and got my drink wrong. It took almost half an hour to get everything I ordered, by which time the food was cold. They then said I cannot charge it to the room, which was specifically why I left a deposit at reception the day before. I had to call reception who then sorted it. The hotel has direct access to the beach, but it's not nice like it looks in the photos. The beach is full of wooden logs and rubbish (see photo) and there were signs saying no swimming. They gave me a quiet room, but the walls and door are not soundproof at all. All night you can hear people banging doors, singing, whistling, using the safe, flushing the toilet etc.

A Decent Stay, But Definitely Needs Renovation We stayed at Truntum Kuta for 2 weeks from 19th July to 2nd August 2025. While our stay was mostly okay, there were some key areas where improvement is really needed especially if the hotel wants to meet modern expectations. What We Liked: ‚Ä¢ The staff were absolutely lovely ‚Äî warm, friendly, and helpful throughout our stay. ‚Ä¢ The entertainment around the pool and bar was enjoyable and gave the hotel a great atmosphere. ‚Ä¢ Linen and towels were replaced daily, which was great to see. ‚Ä¢ The in-house laundry service was quick, affordable, and very convenient. ‚Ä¢ The beachside pool has a beautiful view and relaxing vibe (though in need of repairs ‚Äî see below). ‚Ä¢ A friend of ours used the babysitting service, which they found reliable, affordable, and flexible, with carers available to watch children up until 10 PM ‚Äî a huge plus for families. What Needs Work: ‚Ä¢ The rooms had a damp, musty smell, which is somewhat expected in a tropical climate but still unpleasant. ‚Ä¢ In Room 2109, the air conditioning unit frequently froze, stopped working, and began leaking water onto the floor. Both myself and my 15-month-old child slipped as a result ‚Äî definitely a safety concern. ‚Ä¢ The hotel did send a repair technician, but the problem continued. The system was clearly mismatched and struggling ‚Äî the indoor unit was an old LG, while the outdoor compressor was AUX branded, possibly contributing to the issue. ‚Ä¢ The mattress was extremely hard. We requested a topper, but unfortunately it made little difference in comfort. ‚Ä¢ Room cleanliness was below expectations, not due to poor housekeeping, but more so because the furnishings were worn and outdated. ‚Ä¢ The rain-style showerhead appeared loose and looked like it might fall from the ceiling. ‚Ä¢ The beachside pool had numerous missing tiles, and some even came loose underfoot while we were swimming ‚Äî it‚Äôs definitely due for renovation. ‚Ä¢ We paid extra to include breakfast, but only used it a few times. The quality and variety were underwhelming, and it didn‚Äôt feel worth the cost. Final Thoughts: This hotel has a great location, lovely staff, and some excellent services for families, like babysitting and laundry ‚Äî but it‚Äôs being let down by ageing infrastructure and inconsistent maintenance. We would consider staying again, but only after the renovations are completed, as there are too many issues at the moment for it to be truly comfortable or good value for money. If you‚Äôre planning to book soon, it‚Äôs worth checking what stage the renovations are at and which wing of the hotel your room will be in.
